alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 06 at 12:58AM CST until February 06 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Murder Creek At Brewton affecting Escambia County. For the Murder Creek...including Brewton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Murder Creek At Brewton. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, flooding of Persimmon and Ann Streets begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 PM CST Saturday the stage was 22.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue to slowly fall to below flood stage by later this morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
